title: [Placements] When do placements start for ece ?
content: Guys any idea about when do ece companies start coming to college for placements including the ones which offer internship

comments.body: maybe around next month or July end, not sure when exactly it started for us, I think LAM research was first to come around July I think, maybe it may change this year. Just keep preparing for placements :)

bro my second year just completed   
so would companies start to come frorm 5th sem or 7th sem?
nope, 6th sem onwards, but mostly its al 7th sem - 8th sem only. refer FAQs please
